trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Action>" name="<saml:Action>" href=""></xref> element within a SAML assertion that contains an action on a specified resource.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Action>" name="<saml:Action>" href=""> </xref> elemento dentro de uma asserção SAML, que contém uma ação num recurso especificado.

trans-unit.source: The SamlAction class corresponds the `<saml:Action>` XML element which is defined in the OASIS SAML v1.1 specification.
trans-unit.target: A classe de SamlAction corresponde a `<saml:Action>` elemento XML que está definido na especificação OASIS SAML v&1;.1.

trans-unit.source: Use the SamlAction class when specifying a claim about the ability of a subject <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement> to perform a specified action on a specified resource.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar a classe de SamlAction ao especificar uma afirmação sobre a capacidade de um assunto <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement>para efetuar uma ação especificada num recurso especificado.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement>

trans-unit.source: Use the SamlAction class to specify the desired action and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAccessDecision> class to specify the access decision.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a classe de SamlAction para especificar a ação pretendida e a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAccessDecision>classe para especificar a decisão de acesso.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAccessDecision>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Action%2A> property represents that action and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Namespace%2A> property specifies the XML namespace in which the action is defined.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Action%2A>propriedade representa essa ação e o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Namespace%2A>propriedade especifica o espaço de nomes XML na qual a ação está definida.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Namespace%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: SamlAction position in the SAML object hierarchy is: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement> SamlAction
trans-unit.target: Posição SamlAction na hierarquia de objeto de SAML é: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement>SamlAction</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When using this constructor, to specify the desired namespace for a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction> statement set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Namespace%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando utilizar este construtor, para especificar o espaço de nomes pretendido para uma <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction>conjunto de instrução de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Namespace%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Namespace%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction>

trans-unit.source: To specify the desired action, set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Action%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar a ação pretendida, defina o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Action%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction"></xref> class using the specified action.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction"> </xref> classe utilizando a ação especificada.

trans-unit.source: The `action` parameter sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Action%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O `action` conjuntos de parâmetros a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Action%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: The action that the subject of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement"></xref> security token seeks to perform on the specified resource.
trans-unit.target: A ação que o assunto do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement"> </xref> procura de token de segurança executar o recurso especificado.

trans-unit.source: action is .
trans-unit.target: actionis .

trans-unit.source: -or- action is .
trans-unit.target: -or- action is .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction"></xref> class using the specified action.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction"> </xref> classe utilizando a ação especificada.

trans-unit.source: The `action` parameter sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Action%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O `action` conjuntos de parâmetros a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Action%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `ns` parameter sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Namespace%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O `ns` conjuntos de parâmetros a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Namespace%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Namespace%2A>

trans-unit.source: The action that the subject of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement"></xref> security token seeks to perform on the specified resource.
trans-unit.target: A ação que o assunto do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement"> </xref> procura de token de segurança executar o recurso especificado.

trans-unit.source: The XML namespace in which the `action` parameter is defined.
trans-unit.target: O espaço de nomes XML na qual o `action` parâmetro está definido.

trans-unit.source: action is .
trans-unit.target: actionis .

trans-unit.source: -or- action is .
trans-unit.target: -or- action is .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the action that the subject of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement"></xref> can perform on the specified resource.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a ação que o assunto do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement"> </xref> pode efetuar no recurso especificado.

trans-unit.source: The Action property corresponds to the text of the `<saml:Action>` XML element that is defined in the OASIS SAML 1.1 specification.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Action corresponde ao texto com o `<saml:Action>` elemento XML que está definido na especificação OASIS SAML 1.1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the action that the subject of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token seeks to perform on the specified resource.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a ação que o assunto do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"> </xref> procura de token de segurança executar o recurso especificado.

trans-unit.source: The Action property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Action está definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: -or- The Action property is set to <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: - ou - ação for definida como <xref:System.String.Empty>.</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.IsReadOnly*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and the Action property is set.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.IsReadOnly*>propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> e a propriedade Action está definida.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.IsReadOnly*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the properties of this instance are read-only.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se as propriedades desta instância são só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: To make this instance of the IsReadOnly class read-only, call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.MakeReadOnly%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para efetuar esta instância da classe IsReadOnly só de leitura, chame o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.MakeReadOnly%2A>método.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.MakeReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the properties of this instance are read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as propriedades desta instância são só de leitura; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Causes this instance to be read-only.
trans-unit.target: Faz com que esta instância ser só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: When the MakeReadOnly method is called, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.IsReadOnly%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando se chama o método MakeReadOnly, o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.IsReadOnly%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XML namespace in which the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Action*> property is defined.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o espaço de nomes XML na qual o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Action*>propriedade estiver definida.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Action*>

trans-unit.source: The Namespace property corresponds to the `Namespace` attribute of the `<saml:Action>` XML element that is defined in the OASIS SAML 1.1 specification.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Namespace corresponde ao `Namespace` atributo o `<saml:Action>` elemento XML que está definido na especificação OASIS SAML 1.1.

trans-unit.source: The XML namespace in which the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Action*> property is defined.
trans-unit.target: O espaço de nomes XML na qual o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Action*>propriedade estiver definida.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Action*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.IsReadOnly*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and the Namespace property is set.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.IsReadOnly*>propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> e a propriedade de espaço de nomes está definida.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.IsReadOnly*>

trans-unit.source: Reads the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Action>" name="<saml:Action>" href=""></xref> element using the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: Lê o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Action>" name="<saml:Action>" href=""> </xref> elemento utilizando o leitor de XML especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader> to read the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Action>" name="<saml:Action>" href=""></xref> XML element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>para ler o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Action>" name="<saml:Action>" href=""> </xref> elemento XML.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is capable of reading XML elements in the SAML assertion that are defined in the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"> </xref> que é capaz de ler elementos XML na asserção SAML que são definidos na especificação SAML.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that can read a <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clause.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref> que pode ler um <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""> </xref> cláusula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> that determines the security token that created the digital signature for SAML assertions referenced by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Advice>" name="<saml:Advice>" href=""></xref> XML element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"> </xref> que determina o token de segurança que criou a assinatura digital para asserções de SAML referenciada pelo <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Advice>" name="<saml:Advice>" href=""> </xref> elemento XML.

trans-unit.source: reader is .
trans-unit.target: readeris .

trans-unit.source: -or- samlSerializer is .
trans-unit.target: -or- samlSerializer is .

trans-unit.source: Writes the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction"></xref> into the specified XML writer as a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Action>" name="<saml:Action>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Escreve o <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction"> </xref> para o escritor XML especificado como uma <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Action>" name="<saml:Action>" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter> to write the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Action>" name="<saml:Action>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter>ao escrever o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Action>" name="<saml:Action>" href=""> </xref> elemento.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is capable of writing the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Action>" name="<saml:Action>" href=""></xref> element and its child elements and attributes that are defined in the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"> </xref> que seja capaz de escrita de <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Action>" name="<saml:Action>" href=""> </xref> elemento e os respetivos elementos subordinados e atributos que são definidos na especificação SAML.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that is capable of writing <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clauses.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref> que seja capaz de escrita <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""> </xref> cláusulas.

trans-unit.source: writer is .
trans-unit.target: writeris .

trans-unit.source: -or- samlSerializer is .
trans-unit.target: -or- samlSerializer is .
